name: decom_save_restore
description: Save/restore cursor preserves position with DECOM; turning DECOM off uses absolute addressing
comment: CSI 2;4 r (region rows 1-3), DECOM on, CUP(H) → (1,0), print X at (1,0) cursor at (1,1), ESC 7 save, DECOM off, CUP(H) → (0,0) absolute, print Y at (0,0), ESC 8 restore → (1,1), print Z at (1,1); cursor at (1,2)
